projects.title: Splitter Tip Calculator
projects.desc: Users can enter the bill total, select a preset or custom percentage to tip, and enter the numboer of people in the dinning party.
features: Conditional rendering of elements and styles based on state

projects.title: Team Stat Tracker WebApp
projects.desc: Track your football team's individual player stats.
features: Local storage is used to keep track of data
CRUD functionality - User can create a player and enter their stats, edit a player's stats, update a player's stats, and delete a player
Player's stats are displayed in their respective catagories and are sorted in order form highest to lowest

projects.title: URL Shortening Site
projects.desc: Single Page Site to Shorten a URL
features: Uses Shrtcode's API to shorten a submitted URL
With a promise constructor, used the xhr object to make a HTTP request to Shrtcode
Upon each succesful request a new element is added to the DOM, displaying the original URL and the shortened URL
Uses the browser's clipboard API to copy the short code on a click of a button

projects.title: Spinner Studio Website
projects.desc: Single page site for Spinner Studio. An audio recording and production studio
features: Ability to scroll to a specific spot on the page when clicking a link

projects.title: Crowdfunding Mock-up Page
projects.desc: A single page site that mimics the behavior of the front-end for a crowdfunding site
features: Uses multiple modals for presenting information and updated user. (UI/UX)
Has multiple ways of making a pledge, either directly by a button or by selecting a specific pledge option
Depending on user selection, the corresponding option will be auto-selected or have no option auto-selected
After each pledge a status display will be updated.  It Also has a status bar which will update
